title: Auto Attack Range Indicator
body:
Hey guys question about the Auto Attack Range Indicator... I there a way that the Range Indicator(for Auto Attack) to always be shown?
I know about A-Click showing it, but after clicking it disappears.

replies.body: As of right now, we don't have a way for you to always have that AA range showing. For now the only way you can see your AA range is using the A+click method you've already been using.
